picket line, like showmen exhibiting a curiosity, no longer looked at the French but paid attention to the sight-seers and grew weary waiting to be relieved. Prince An- drew halted to have a look at the French. 
"Look! Look there 1" one soldier was saying to another, pointing to a Russian musketeer who had gone up to the picket line with an of- ficer and was rapidly and excitedly talking to a French grenadier. "Hark to him jabbering! Fine, isn't it? It's all the Frenchycan do to keep up with h
